org.gridgain.grid.cache.query
Enum GridCacheQueryType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<GridCacheQueryType>
      org.gridgain.grid.cache.query.GridCacheQueryType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<GridCacheQueryType>
public enum GridCacheQueryType
extends Enum<GridCacheQueryType>

Defines different cache query types. For more information on cache query types and their usage see GridCacheQuery documentation.

Wiki & Forum:

Forum

GridCacheQuery
 

Enum Constant Summary
H2TEXT
          Query based on H2 database text search.
LUCENE
          Query based on Apache Lucene text search.
SCAN
          Fully scans cache returning only entries that pass certain filters.
SQL
          SQL-based query.
